content: knit 2 stitches for every 3 row down the side of the arm hole place marker and join in the round make sure your stitch count is a multiple of 4 knit 5555 5555 5555 5555 5555 5555 5555 6666 6666 6666 6666 6666 6666 6666 rounds in 2x2 rib starting with k2 cast off in pattern repeat for second armhole ppppoooocccckkkkeeeetttt eeeeddddggggiiiinnnngggg using 4 5mm needles and cc pick up and knit 3 stitches for every 4 row along the diagonal edge of the pockets you need to have a stitch count that is a multiple of 4 plus 2 knit ---- ---- ---- ---- 5555 5555 7777 7777 7777 7777 7777 7777 7777 7777 row in 2x2 rib starting with p2 cast off in knit repeat for second pocket the copyright of this pattern remains with the author - rachel evans button & bean designs ffffiiiinnnniiiisssshhhhiiiinnnngggg this pattern is intended for personal home use only any commercial use of this pattern without sew in ends sew the pocket edging parallel to the written permission from the author is in violation hem of the jacket block garment and sew on of copyright if you wish to sell garments from buttons this pattern a cottage license is available please contact me on ravelry under the username craftyweewifey or by email at craftyweewifey@yahoo co nz © button & bean designs 2013
